name: Boundary Break
description:
Boundary Break

The game where you must clip out of bounds to win! Normally clipping/glitches are unintended and can lead to skips, but in this game you use them to beat levels.

Instructions

The built-in dialogue system should teach you everything you need to play the game. If you get stuck, press R to restart the level.

Jam Submission

This game was a submission to the Explosive Game Jam where the theme was "out of bounds". I didn't have as much time to work on this as I'd hoped due to school and whatnot, but It's still a decent prototype of what I had in mind. I tried to make it fast-paced, with the slide mechanic allowing for huge speed and air strafing to redirect momentum (I also considered a bhop type mechanic but did not have time to implement it). Perhaps in later updates I will add new mechanics and levels. Also, the geometry could use some polish and the graphics could be much better. Sound effects,  a HUD, and menus would also be in order. Anyways, I hope you enjoy playing my short game!

- Toadi
